ygData.subject: Re: To attack or not to attack?

KitKat2::
She kissed him and smiled at him warmly. "So commander, what are your 
orders? Your the boss now aren't you? Surely you have a job for me?" 
She chuckled. "And no sending me to your room either." She kissed him.
She watched DarkMouse walk back into the room. 
"Got any troops for me to train?"

She was glad to have Drillbit at her side, but she missed being in 
command.  She also missed having troops to train with.  She loved 
Drillbit and wanted to make him happy. But her predacon side wanted 
to fight and win battles.  Once again, she felt torn between love and 
work. 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Hmmm."
> He opened a comm.
> "DarkFate, Killfest, never mind. It was a false alarm."
> He watched Dark Mouse leave. Why did she seem like the little 
sister?
> He turns back to KitKat, taking her into his arms.
> "Well, I guess the war has given us some time."
> He once again kisses her.
